document.full_text: cuba's communist party congress suggested refinements to president raul castro's wide-ranging national reforms in weekend meetings, but generally embraces his overhaul of the ailing cuban economy, state-run media reported on monday.
document.title: cuba congress embraces, refines raul castro reforms
lines_and_colors: cuba's communist party congress suggested refinements to president raul castro's wide-ranging national reforms in weekend meetings, but generally embraces his overhaul of the ailing cuban economy, state-run media reported on monday.
